Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.shape.text

Class TextEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
      • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.shape.text.TextEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Activatable, Anchorable, Bounded, NodeProvider, Placeable, Removeable, Rotatable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicTextEntity
    public class TextEntity
extends YaegerEntity
    A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene. The text will be placed, using the top left corner as its anchor point.

    • Field Summary

      • setFont

        public void setFont​(javafx.scene.text.Font font)
        Set the Font to be used. A Font encapsulates multiple properties.

        To only set the font type and size: setFont(Font.FONT ("Verdana", 20));

        It is also possible to set more properties: setFont(Font.FONT("Verdana", FontWeight.BOLD, 70));

        Parameters:
        font - the Font to be used

      • setOriginX

        public void setOriginX​(double x)
        Description copied from interface: Placeable
        Set the new x-coordinate of this YaegerEntity. The x-coordinate will be of the top-left corner of the BoundingBox that is being used by this YaegerEntity.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate as a double.

      • setOriginY

        Parameters:
